text:
Fourth Additional Sessions Judge Gladson Blessed Tagore awarded life imprisonment to R. Seevalaperian (20) of Kondaanagaram under Suththamalli police station limits for murdering an old man.

According to prosecution, Seevalaperian had a heated argument with his neighbour M. Palavesam (65) after the old man refused to give him money. When the argument became intense, Palavesam assaulted Seevalaperian. Hence, he murdered Palavesam on June 29, 2014. The Judge also slapped a fine of Rs.1,000.
title: Youth gets life term
